Wonder's Puzzle Assortment
AboutPuzzles By Category

Puzzles

  • Land of Poison

    Difficulty: Strong Poison

    In the land of poison, things work differently: the only antidote to a poison is a stronger poison. If you consume a weak poison followed by a strong one, you’ll be completely fine, but if you consume a strong poison followed by a weak one, you’ll still die.

    other

  • Coconuts and Castaways

    Difficulty: several coconuts

    Ten people land on a deserted island. There they find lots of coconuts and a monkey. During their first day they gather coconuts and put them all in a community pile. After working all day they decide to sleep and divide them into ten equal piles the next morning.

    math

  • Three Gods

    Difficulty: 3 questions

    Can you figure out the identity of the three gods?

    logic lies

  • Chicken, Fox, and Corn

    Difficulty: 1 river

    Bring everything across the river with you.

    logic river

  • 3 Cannibals and 3 Missionaries

    Difficulty: 3 Cannibals

    Get everyone across the river.

    logic river

  • Probability of Touching a Point

    Difficulty: Infinite

    You have a graph in R^2 with points at every pair of integer coordinates (excluding the origin).

    math probability

I like puzzles and riddles, and I'm collecting some of the ones I like here.
